text: Let There Be Rock is a studio album by the Australian hard rock band AC/DC. It was released on 23 June 1977. == Track listing == # Go Down 5:31 # Dog Eat Dog 3:35 # Let There Be Rock 6:06 # Bad Boy Boogie 4:27 # Problem Child 5:25 # Overdose 6:09 # Hell Ain't A Bad Place To Be 4:14 # Whole Lotta Rosie 5:24 ==References== Category:AC/DC albums Category:1977 albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Blues rock albums Category:Rock and roll albums Category:Heavy metal albums Category:Albert Productions albums
title: Let There Be Rock
